item.title: 美国宣布对俄罗斯石油公司和卢克石油公司实施制裁
item.description: 美国对俄罗斯大型石油公司俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil）实施制裁，并表示准备采取进一步行动，同时呼吁莫斯科立即同意在俄罗斯的乌克兰战争中停火。【原文：The United States imposed sanctions on major Russian oil companies Rosneft and Lukoil, and said it was prepared to take further action as it called on Moscow to immediately agree to a ceasefire in Russia's war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 德事隆任命内部人士阿瑟顿为首席执行官，唐纳利继续担任董事长
item.description: 德事隆（Textron）飞机制造商周三表示，该公司首席执行官斯科特-唐纳利（Scott Donnelly）将由内部人士丽莎-阿瑟顿（Lisa Atherton）接任，明年 1 月 4 日生效。【原文：Textron chief executive Scott Donnelly will be succeeded by insider Lisa Atherton, effective January 4 next year, the aircraft maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西南航空第三季度盈利超预期
item.description: 受收入增长和运营成本低于预期的影响，美国西南航空公司周三出人意料地公布了第三季度盈利报告。【原文：Southwest Airlines surprisingly reported a third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by stronger revenue and lower-than-expected operating costs.】

item.title: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽当选董事会主席，获得 2,500 万美元股票奖励
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）在周三提交的一份文件中说，她当选为董事会主席。【原文：Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser was elected as chair of board of directors, the bank said in a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 云计算需求强劲，SAP 第三季度利润增长 12
item.description: 德国软件制造商 SAP 周三公布，受强劲的云计算需求推动，第三季度利润增长了 12%。【原文：German software maker SAP on Wednesday reported a 12%rise in third-quarter profit, boosted by strong cloud demand.】

item.title: OpenAI 和甲骨文宣布星际之门数据中心选址威斯康星州
item.description: OpenAI 与甲骨文公司和 Vantage Data Centers 公司周三表示，将在威斯康星州华盛顿港的密尔沃基市外开发一个数据中心园区，作为星际之门项目的一部分。【原文：OpenAI, along with Oracle and Vantage Data Centers, will develop a data center campus outside Milwaukee, in Port Washington, Wisconsin, as part of the Stargate project, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 人工智能助力软件和大型机销售，IBM 季度业绩超预期
item.description: IBM周三公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，主要原因是软件和新型大型机需求旺盛，而人工智能模型的部署热潮又促进了支持这些模型的底层技术的销售。【原文：IBM beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday, driven by booming demand for its software and new mainframe as the rush to deploy AI models boosts sales for the underlying technology supporting them.】

item.title: 因天然气需求强劲，康德摩根第三季度利润增长
item.description: 受管道天然气运输量增加的影响，美国管道运营商金德摩根公司（Kinder Morgan）周三公布第三季度利润增长。【原文：U.S. pipeline operator Kinder Morgan posted a rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher volumes of natural gas transported through its pipelines.】

item.title: 税收减免到期推动美国电动汽车销量增长，特斯拉创纪录的收入超出预期
item.description: 特斯拉周三公布了创纪录的第三季度营收报告，超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于特斯拉电动汽车创下的最高季度销量，因为在美国一项关键的税收减免政策上个月到期之前，汽车买家纷纷抢购。【原文：Tesla reported record third-quarter revenue, beating Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by the highest quarterly sales of its electric vehicles as car buyers rushed to lock in a key U.S. tax credit ahead of its expiry last month.】

item.title: 空中客车公司预计到 2044 年全球货运机队将增长 45
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周三表示，在长期贸易增长的推动下，未来20年全球所有制造商的专用货机机队规模将增至3420架，增幅达45%。【原文：Airbus said on Wednesday the worldwide fleet of dedicated freighter aircraft by all makers should rise to 3,420 in the next 20 years, or a 45% increase, helped by long-term trade growth.】

item.title: 硅谷支持的盾牌人工智能公司利用新型 "僚机 "无人机加入战斗机竞赛
item.description: 总部位于硅谷的防务技术公司盾牌人工智能（Shield AI）周三表示，该公司已经推出了大型X-Bat无人机的概念模型，加入了越来越多争相向美国军方提供微型战斗机式无人机的公司行列。【原文：Silicon Valley-based defense technology firm Shield AI has launched a conceptual model of its large X-Bat drone, the company said on Wednesday, joining a growing field of companies vying to supply the U.S. military with mini fighter jet-style drones.】

item.title: 保守派活动人士就人工智能生成的声明起诉谷歌
item.description: 保守派活动家罗比-斯塔巴克（Robby Starbuck）周三起诉谷歌，称这家科技巨头的人工智能系统生成了关于他的 "极其虚假 "的信息。【原文：Conservative activist Robby Starbuck sued Google on Wednesday, alleging the tech giant's artificial intelligence systems generated "outrageously false" information about him.】

item.title: 亚马逊利用高科技驾驶员眼镜和人工智能加快送货速度
item.description: 亚马逊一直在不遗余力地加快为客户提供日常用品的速度，它已将客户的期望从两天送达转变为当天送达，甚至在一小时内送达。现在，通过机器人、人工智能甚至眼镜，亚马逊正在努力缩短每次送货的时间。【原文：In its relentless drive to bring everyday items to customers faster, Amazon has shifted expectations from two-day delivery to same-day and even within an hour. Now, with robots, artificial intelligence and even eyewear, it is working to pare seconds off each delivery.】

item.title: 新泽西州称亚马逊歧视怀孕和残疾仓库工人
item.description: 新泽西州周三起诉亚马逊公司，指控该公司非法拒绝为有残疾或怀孕的仓库员工提供工作场所便利，并解雇了一些提出要求的员工。【原文：The state of New Jersey sued Amazon.com on Wednesday, accusing the company of unlawfully refusing workplace accommodations to warehouse employees who have disabilities or were pregnant and firing some who asked for them.】

item.title: 希尔顿：美国政府停摆给企业带来损失的最新标榜
item.description: 希尔顿全球公司的财务总监周三警告说，美国政府的持续停摆正在影响旅游需求，这与其他企业领导人的担忧如出一辙，因为如果僵局不能很快得到解决，企业就要为更广泛的影响做好准备。【原文：Hilton Worldwide's finance chief warned on Wednesday that the ongoing U.S. government shutdown was affecting travel demand, echoing concerns from other corporate leaders as businesses brace for broader fallout if the impasse is not resolved soon.】

item.title: 特朗普称通用、福特高管为关税和股票飙升感谢他
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普说，通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司的首席执行官周三打电话感谢他对中型和大型卡车征收关税，并表示他们公司的股票已经飙升。【原文：President Donald Trump said the chief executives of General Motors Co and Ford Motor Co called to thank him on Wednesday for putting tariffs on mid- and large-sized trucks, saying their companies stock has soared.】

item.title: 欧盟东布罗夫斯基斯称可能采取反制措施应对中国稀土禁令
item.description: 欧盟最高经济官员周三接受《德国商报》（Handelsblatt）采访时表示，欧盟委员会正在考虑采取反制措施，以应对中国对稀土出口的限制。【原文：The EU's top economic official said the European Commission was considering countermeasures in response to Chinese curbs on rare earth exports, according to an interview with Handelsblatt published on Wednesday.】

item.title: Kering 首席运营官表示，向欧莱雅出售美容资产将带来 "净收益
item.description: Kering 首席运营官让-马克-杜普莱（Jean-Marc Duplaix）在周三的电话会议上被问及该交易是否会导致减值时告诉分析师，Kering 向欧莱雅出售其美容业务将给 Kering 的年度业绩带来 "税前净收益"。【原文：Kering's sale of its beauty business to L'Oreal will result in a "net gain before tax" in Kering's annual results, COO Jean-Marc Duplaix told analysts in a call on Wednesday when asked if the transaction would lead to a writedown.】

item.title: 消息人士称，HSG 和 Jane Street 是 Kraken 九月募资的投资者之一
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）、奥本海默公司（Oppenheimer）、简街公司（Jane Street）和恒生集团（HSG，前身为红杉资本中国基金）投资了加密货币交易所 Kraken 最近的一轮融资，该轮融资对该公司的估值为 150 亿美元。【原文：Apollo Global Management, Oppenheimer, Jane Street and HSG, formerly known as Sequoia Capital China, invested in crypto exchange Kraken's recent funding round that valued the company at $15 billion, said two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Reddit 起诉 Perplexity 为训练人工智能系统而收集数据
item.description: 社交媒体平台 Reddit 周三在纽约联邦法院起诉人工智能初创公司 Perplexity，指控该公司和其他三家公司非法获取其数据，用于训练 Perplexity 基于人工智能的搜索引擎。【原文：Social media platform Reddit sued artificial intelligence startup Perplexity in New York federal court on Wednesday, accusing it and three other companies of unlawfully scraping its data to train Perplexity's AI-based search engine.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲卫星合并的消息迟迟未公布，但合并计划未受影响
item.description: 周三，欧洲航空航天巨头让投资者多等了一天，等待新太空冠军的细节，因为律师和顾问们正在仔细研究小字，但熟悉谈判的人士说，合并计划仍未改变。【原文：Europe's aerospace giants kept investors waiting an extra day for details of a new space champion on Wednesday as lawyers and advisers pored over the smallprint, but merger plans remained intact, people familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 独家新闻美国考虑限制使用美国软件生产的对华出口产品
item.description: 据一位美国官员和三位了解美国当局情况的人士透露，特朗普政府正在考虑一项计划，以遏制从笔记本电脑到喷气发动机等一系列令人眼花缭乱的对华软件出口，从而报复中国政府最新一轮的稀土出口限制。【原文：The Trump administration is considering a plan to curb a dizzying array of software-powered exports to China, from laptops to jet engines, to retaliate against Beijing's latest round of rare earth export restrictions, according to a U.S. official and three people briefed by U.S. authorities.】

item.title: 特朗普税法中的停摆解雇可能阻碍经济发展
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在美国历史上持续时间第二长的政府停摆期间大规模解雇联邦工作人员，这可能会妨碍实施他的大规模减税和支出法案中永久性的两项税收激励措施，这两项措施旨在促进对低收入社区的投资。【原文：President Donald Trump's mass firings of federal workers during the second-longest government shutdown in U.S. history could hamper implementation of two tax incentives made permanent in his massive tax-cut and spending bill meant to boost investment in low-income communities.】

item.title: Kering 第三季度销售额超预期，投资者押注 Gucci 东家东山再起
item.description: 法国开云集团（Kering）周三表示，其旗舰品牌古驰（Gucci）第三季度的销售额下降了14%，集团整体销售额同比下降了5%，超出市场预期。【原文：Sales at Kering's flagship brand Gucci fell by 14% in the third quarter with overall group sales down 5% on a like-for-like basis, the French group said on Wednesday, beating market expectations.】

item.title: 北美市场不如预期，米其林销售额受挫
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林报告今年第三季度销售额下降 6.6%，低于市场预期，原因是北美市场的经营状况不如预期【原文：French tyre maker Michelin reported a 6.6% decline in sales in the third quarter of the year, below market expectations, citing worse-than-expected business conditions in the North American market】

item.title: 惠誉称美国支持帮助阿根廷避免评级下调
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周三表示，美国对阿根廷市场的支持阻止了对这个南美国家信用评级的下调，但该国需要一个更广泛的计划来重建外汇储备，以获得评级上调。【原文：U.S. support for Argentina's markets has prevented a downgrade of the South American country's credit rating, but the country needs a broader plan to rebuild foreign exchange reserves in order to earn an upgrade, Fitch Ratings said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，阿波罗正在探索出售西班牙裔食品零售商 Heritage Grocers Group
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）正寻求出售旗下的西班牙裔杂货连锁店 Heritage Grocers Group，售价约为 15 亿美元，因为担心移民突袭会削弱全美拉丁裔社区的消费需求。【原文：Private equity firm Apollo Global Management is looking to sell its Hispanic grocery chain Heritage Grocers Group, which could fetch roughly $1.5 billion, as fear of immigration raids weakens consumer demand in Latino communities across the U.S., according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，比利时考虑对耗电数据中心实施能源限制
item.description: 比利时电网运营商表示，在为人工智能提供电力的能源密集型设施需求激增之后，可能会对数据中心设定电力分配限额，以防止其他工业用户被挤出市场。【原文：Belgium's grid operator could set an electricity allocation limit on data centres to prevent other industrial users from being squeezed out, it said, following a surge in demand from the energy-intensive facilities that power AI.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯公司申请主动管理型加密货币 ETF
item.description: 资产管理公司 T. Rowe Price 周三申请设立一只主动管理型加密货币交易所交易基金。【原文：Asset manager T. Rowe Price filed for an actively managed crypto exchange-traded fund on Wednesday.】

item.title: 油价持续低迷，第三季度上游油气交易减少
item.description: 分析公司 Enverus 周三表示，持续疲软的原油价格给第三季度美国上游石油和天然气行业的并购活动带来了压力。【原文：Persistently weak crude prices pressured merger and acquisition activity in the U.S. upstream oil and gas sector in the third quarter, analytics firm Enverus said on Wednesday.】
